document.title: Removing a feature
document.paragraph:
1Removing a feature To remove a feature, you may of course delete the corresponding lines in the class text. You can also use the Diagram tool if it is an attribute or a function. To do so, make sure that supplier links are shown in the diagram (if
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_supplier_color.gif is not pressed, click it). Pick the link that correspond to the feature you want to remove and drop the pebble on
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_color.gif .
See Also
30_adding_a_feature/00_introduction.xml Adding a feature
